thread.title: Moonstruck John
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by Moonstruck John

author: Moonstruck John
title: Moonstruck John
text: Prices were as low as the major competition and tax-free for me. I used live chat with Larry C to get three key questions answered before placing my order. The user reviews were key to my selection and I was glad to see they were verified buyers, not professional reviewers who get product for free. Shipping is quick enough. Dealing with sellers that know there stuff is a delight, and I avoided a potentially costly mistake when it comes to teleconverters.
